# DiscountedMKRSKYAdapter Historic Report

## Overview

This adapter calculates the MKR price based on the SKY price using the formula:

```
MKR_price = SKY_price * EXCHANGE_RATE * (1 - DISCOUNT)
```

## Configuration

| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Adapter Output | MKR/USD (calculated) |
| SKY/USD Feed | [0xee10fE5E7aa92dd7b136597449c3d5813cFC5F18](https://etherscan.io/address/0xee10fE5E7aa92dd7b136597449c3d5813cFC5F18) |
| MKR/USD Feed (Reference) | [0xec1D1B3b0443256cc3860e24a46F108e699484Aa](https://etherscan.io/address/0xec1D1B3b0443256cc3860e24a46F108e699484Aa) |
| Exchange Rate | 24000:1 (1 MKR = 24000 SKY) |
| Discount | Dynamic (fetched from MkrSky contract) |
| Decimals | 8 |
| Network | Ethereum Mainnet |
| Block Range | 23866000 - 24304000 |
| Date Range | 2025-11-24 03:18 - 2026-01-24 10:16 |
